name: Shelfpay
description: India's first shared payments app for flatmates with pooled wallets, automatic expense splitting, payment cards, rent automation, and cashback rewards with zero hidden fees

opengraph.title: Shelf: India's 1st shared payments app
opengraph.description: Simplify shared expenses with Shelf, the payment card for flatmates. Split costs, earn rewards, and automate rent & utility bills with no hidden fees.
opengraph.twitter_description: Simplify shared expenses with Shelf, the payment card for flatmates. Split costs, earn rewards, and automate rent & utility bills with no hidden fees.
